question: You want to sell some of your furniture. You think a friend of yours might like to buy it from you.Write a letter to your friend. In your letterexplain why you are sellingdescribe the furnituresuggest a date when your friend can come and see the furniture
text: How are you? It's been so long since we were able to catch up.
I am selling my dining table and I was wondering if you want to buy it.

I don't know if you knew but I will be relocating to Glenstone in the next two weeks to work for Glade for a year. So now, I am selling all my furniture and I will use the money to settle down there comfortably.

I remembered you like this table, but in case you forgot, it's a table made out of a walnut tree. It's around a hundred inches wide that can fit 6-8 people. It comes with matching chairs, which I can include in your purchase if you want.

I am in my flat anytime on the weekends and every after 6 pm on the weekdays from today to August 10, and you can see it if you like. Though, even If you will not buy it, I think we should meet up before I go.
Just let me know when you'll be coming. Looking forward to hearing from you!
